Direct Movement.desc: Direct the movement of the vehicle

Smoke Grenade.desc: Throw a smoke-emitting grenade out of the tank

Operate Gun.desc: Operate a main gun and the turret

Operate MG.desc: Operate the MG from this position

Reload.desc: Assist in reloading the main gun, increasing fire rate

Manage Ready Rack.desc: Add or remove ammo from the Ready Rack

Drive.desc: Move forward or backward, pivot hull, or attempt to gain Hull Down

Reposition.desc: Move within the area, possibly into a new terrain type

Attempt Unbog.desc: Attempt to free the vehicle from being bogged down

Abandon Tank.desc: All crew bail out of the tank and retreat to friendly lines

Fire Smoke Mortar.desc: Fire the smoke mortar, creating concealing smoke in front of the turret
